content.rendered:
Loveshoot in magical Morocco

The 1001 night fairy tale comes to life in magical Morocco. In Marrakech to be precise. Yassica and Yahya are from Germany and have a holiday here. They are in love and want to have that captured. Where better can you do that than in Marrakesh Morocco with a coupleshoot?

“The sound you hear on the Djemaa el Fna is so typical for that place”

After enjoying a relaxing hammam, we met in the old centre of Marrakech. The three of us walked through the narrow streets of the Moroccan city. We ended up in the busiest square in Marrakech. The sound you hear on the Djemaa el Fna is so typical for this place.

The whistle of the snake charmers, the drums, the Arabian singing and the screaming market vendors trying to sell their goods. Maybe a little less romantic, but very photogenic. That’s why we ended the love shoot on a terrace where we enjoyed an amazing view of the city while enjoying a drink. Thank you dear Yahya and Yassica, you are lovely!

“Plan a romantic coupleshoot in Marrakesh or another breathtaking country”

Tip: do you want to plan a love shoot in Morocco or another country? You can! Feel free to send me a message with your wishes and ideas. I like to think along with you. Let’s create something beautiful together!

“Want to get married in Morocco?”

I also have a Marrakesh wedding online for you. If you want to have a look, click here to watch en enjoy!

SWITCH TO ITALIAN
